summary.span: 表示一个时间点，通常以相对于协调世界时 (UTC) 的日期和时间来表示。

span.span: Represents a point in time, typically expressed as a date and time of day, relative to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构包含值以及属性，用于定义当前之间的差异实例的日期和时间与协调世界时 (UTC)。The structure includes a value, together with an property that defines the difference between the current instance's date and time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 它完全定义的日期和时间相对于 UTC，因为结构不包括`Kind`成员，作为结构。Because it exactly defines a date and time relative to UTC, the structure does not include a `Kind` member, as the structure does. 它表示日期和时间值采用 UTC 范围 12:00:00，年 1 月 1 日午夜 0001 午夜 11:59:59 止 （基督纪元） 到 11:59:59 PM，到公元 9999 年 12 月 31 日It represents dates and times with values whose UTC ranges from 12:00:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 Anno Domini (Common Era), to 11:59:59 P.M., December 31, 9999 A.D. (C.E.)。(C.E.). 时间部分的值以 100 毫微秒为单位称为计时周期，和特定日期是自午夜 12:00，公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日以来的计时周期数The time component of a value is measured in 100-nanosecond units called ticks, and a particular date is the number of ticks since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 A.D. (C.E.)在日历。(C.E.) in the calendar. 一个值始终表示上下文的显式或默认日历中。A value is always expressed in the context of an explicit or default calendar. 中的计时周期总数不包括归因于闰秒为单位的计时周期数。Ticks that are attributable to leap seconds are not included in the total number of ticks. > [!NOTE] > 如果您正在使用计时周期值，你想要将转换为其他时间间隔，如分钟或秒，则应使用， ， ， ，或常量来执行此转换。If you are working with a ticks value that you want to convert to some other time interval, such as minutes or seconds, you should use the , , , , or constant to perform the conversion. 例如，若要添加的秒数表示的时钟周期到指定数值组成部分值，可以使用表达式`dateValue.Second + nTicks/Timespan.TicksPerSecond`。For example, to add the number of seconds represented by a specified number of ticks to the component of a value, you can use the expression `dateValue.Second + nTicks/Timespan.TicksPerSecond`. 尽管值包含一个偏移量，它不是一种完全时区感知的数据结构。Although a value includes an offset, it is not a fully time zone-aware data structure. 一个特征的时区与 UTC 的偏移量时，它并不明确地标识一个时区。While an offset from UTC is one characteristic of a time zone, it does not unambiguously identify a time zone. 不仅执行多个时区具有相同的偏移量从 UTC，而且如果实行夏令时更改一个时区的偏移量。Not only do multiple time zones share the same offset from UTC, but the offset of a single time zone changes if it observes daylight saving time. 这意味着，只要值与其时区，它可以不再进行明确链接回其原始时区。This means that, as soon as a value is disassociated from its time zone, it can no longer be unambiguously linked back to its original time zone. 因为是一种结构，已声明但未初始化的对象包含的默认值为每个成员字段。Because is a structure, a object that has been declared but not otherwise initialized contains the default values for each of its member fields. 这意味着，其属性设置为并将其属性设置为。This means that its property is set to and its property is set to . 您可以创建一个新通过调用其构造函数重载，它类似于重载构造任何的函数值结构。You can create a new value by calling any of the overloads of its constructor, which are similar to the overloaded constructors for the structure. 您还可以创建一个新通过将其分配值值。You can also create a new value by assigning it a value. 这是隐式转换;它不需要强制转换运算符 （在 C# 中) 或调用转换方法 （在 Visual Basic 中)。This is an implicit conversion; it does not require a casting operator (in C#) or call to a conversion method (in Visual Basic). 此外可以初始化值的字符串表示形式的日期和时间，通过调用静态字符串分析方法，其中包括许多， ， ，和。You can also initialize a value from the string representation of a date and time by calling a number of static string parsing methods, which include , , , and . 成员结构提供以下几个方面的功能：The members of the structure provide functionality in the following areas: - 日期和时间算术。Date and time arithmetic. 可以添加或减去的日期或时间间隔从特定值。You can add or subtract either dates or time intervals from a particular value. 算术运算值，与具有不同时返回的结果值，调整时间偏移量中的差异。Arithmetic operations with values, unlike those with values, adjust for differences in time offsets when returning a result. 例如，下面的代码使用变量以减去相应的当前本地时间从当前的 UTC 时间。For example, the following code uses variables to subtract the current local time from the current UTC time. 然后，代码使用变量来执行相同的操作。The code then uses variables to perform the same operation. 使用减法值时使用该减法运算返回 UTC，从本地时区的差值值返回。The subtraction with values returns the local time zone's difference from UTC, while the subtraction with values returns . [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Type/cs/Type.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Type/vb/Type.vb#1)] - 类型转换操作。Type conversion operations. 可以将转换值到值，反之亦然。You can convert values to values and vice versa. - 时间操作和提取操作。Time manipulation and extraction operations. 你可以提取日期或时间的值。You can extract either the date or the time of a value. 此外可以检索特定的值组件，例如其年份或月份。You can also retrieve the value of a particular component, such as its year or its month. - 日期和时间转换。Date and time conversion. 可以将任何转换到另一个值值，该值表示在另一个时区的时间相同的点。You can convert any value to another value that represents the same point in time in another time zone. 但是，仅在的情况下应用时区的调整规则方法，它将转换本地系统区域中的为日期和时间值。However, a time zone's adjustment rules are applied only in the case of the method, which converts a value to the date and time in the local system zone. - 日期和时间的比较。Date and time comparison. 您可以确定是否有任何特定值是早于、 等于还是晚于另一个值。You can determine whether any particular value is earlier than, the same as, or later than another value. 在执行比较前，所有值都转换为 UTC。Before the comparison is performed, all values are converted to UTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性中移除的时间部分，从任何重要部分对象，并只返回其有意义的日期组件。This property removes any significant part of the time component from a object and returns only its significant date component. 例如，如果的对象的日期和时间的值"1/12/07 下午 4:01 + 7:30"，该属性返回的值"1/12/07 12:00:00"。For example, if the object has a date and time value of "1/12/07 4:01pm +7:30", the property returns a value of "1/12/07 12:00:00 AM". 然后可以使用任何标准或自定义格式说明符来显示日期只显示值。The value can then be displayed by using any of the standard or custom format specifiers that display dates only. （请参阅示例部分的说明。）(See the Example section for an illustration.) 值所返回的属性对象始终是。The value of the property of the returned object is always . 值不影响属性。It is not affected by the value of the property. 若要显示不带其时间部分的日期，您可以使用"D"或者"d"格式说明符;有关说明，请参阅示例部分。To display a date without its time component, you can also use the "D" or "d" format specifiers; for an illustration, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的示例检索的值特定日期的属性。The following example retrieves the value of the property for a specific date. 然后会将该值显示在控制台使用某些标准和自定义日期格式说明符。It then displays that value to the console using some standard and custom date-only format specifiers. remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 文件时间是 64 位值，它表示午夜 12:00，公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日起经过的 100 纳秒间隔数A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 使用的文件时间记录时应用程序创建、 访问，或写入文件。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. Windows 文件时间是通过 Windows API 直接访问通过调用`GetFileTime`函数，返回`FILETIME`结构。A Windows file time is directly accessible through the Windows API by calling the `GetFileTime` function, which returns a `FILETIME` structure. 单个函数参数是要检索其文件的时间信息的文件句柄。The single function parameter is the handle of the file whose file time information is to be retrieved. 通过调用检索的文件句柄`CreateFile`函数。The file handle is retrieved by calling the `CreateFile` function. `FILETIME`结构的`dwHighDateTime`成员包含的文件时间的四个高序位字节并将其`dwLowDateTime`成员包含的四个低序位字节。The `FILETIME` structure's `dwHighDateTime` member contains the four high-order bytes of the file time, and its `dwLowDateTime` member contains the four low-order bytes. 下面的示例说明了如何检索 Windows 文件时间值并将它们转换为值。The example that follows illustrates how to retrieve Windows file time values and convert them to values. 也可以从创建 Windows 文件时间值值通过调用并方法，并从值通过调用方法。Windows file time values can also be created from values by calling the and methods, and from values by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 Windows API 检索写字板可执行文件的 Windows 文件时间。The following example uses the Windows API to retrieve the Windows file times for the WordPad executable. summary.span: 获取 值，该值表示当前 对象的本地日期和时间。

span.span: Gets a value that represents the local date and time of the current object.

value.span: 当前的 对象的本地日期和时间。

span.span: The local date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有必要，请属性将为当前对象的日期和时间为本地系统的日期和时间。If necessary, the property converts the current object's date and time to the local system's date and time. 转换是一个包含两个步骤操作：The conversion is a two-step operation: 1. 该属性将当前对象的时间为协调世界时 (UTC)。The property converts the current object's time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 2. 然后，该属性将 UTC 转换为本地时间。The property then converts UTC to local time. 有没有无效的时间并不明确时间映射到本地时区的标准时间。There are no invalid times and ambiguous times are mapped to the local zone's standard time. (但是，转换可以创建异常情况： 如果派生自本地计算机的值反映了不明确的日期和时间，值可以转换为 UTC，然后返回不同于原始时间了本地时间。)执行此转换时，则属性将应用在本地时区内的任何调整规则。(However, the conversion can create an anomaly: if a value that is derived from the local computer reflects an ambiguous date and time, that value can be converted to UTC and then back to a local time that differs from the original time.) The property applies any adjustment rules in the local time zone when it performs this conversion. 此属性返回的日期和时间组成部分对象，使其非常适合到转换。This property returns both the date and the time component of a object, which makes it useful for to conversion. 除了执行任何必要的时间转换时，此属性不同于属性的值设置所返回的属性对象传递给。In addition to performing any necessary time conversion, this property differs from the property by setting the value of the property of the returned object to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示几个转换的美国太平洋时区中的本地时间的值太平洋标准时区运行。The following example illustrates several conversions of values to local times in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone. 请注意，最后三个时间都不明确;该属性将所有这些映射到单个日期和时间在太平洋标准时区中。Note that the last three times are all ambiguous; the property maps all of them to a single date and time in the Pacific Standard Time zone. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此常量的值为 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM + 00:00。The value of this constant is 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM +00:00. 属性用于确定是否的一个新值对象或的算术运算返回值是相同等于或早于此最大范围值。The property is used to determine whether the value of a new object or the value returned by an arithmetic operation is the same as or earlier than this maximum range value. 如果不是这样，该方法将引发。If it is not, the method throws an . 任何值转换为协调世界时 (UTC)，该方法将其与进行比较之前。Any value is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before the method compares it with . 这意味着，值的日期和时间是接近最大范围，但其偏移量为负，则可能会引发异常。This means that a value whose date and time are close to the maximum range, but whose offset is negative, may throw an exception. 例如，值 12/31/9999 下午 11:00-02:00 不在范围内，因为它是一小时晚于时转换为 UTC。For example, the value 12/31/9999 11:00 PM -02:00 is out of range because it is one hour later than when it is converted to UTC. 某些日历，如，支持早于上部的日期范围。Some calendars, such as the , support an upper date range that is earlier than . 在这些情况下，尝试访问变量赋值或格式设置和分析操作中可能会引发。In these cases, trying to access in variable assignments or formatting and parsing operations can throw an . 而不是检索的值，可以检索的值中指定的区域性的最新有效的日期值属性。Instead of retrieving the value of , you can retrieve the value of the specified culture's latest valid date value from the property.

exception.span: 位于当前或指定区域性的默认日历的范围之外。

span.span: is outside the range of the current or specified culture's default calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使编译器能够自动转换对象传递给而无需使用显式强制转换运算符 （在 C#) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的转换函数的调用的对象。The method enables the compiler to automatically convert a object to a object without an explicit casting operator (in C#) or a call to a conversion function (in Visual Basic). 它定义了扩大转换，不会丢失数据，也不会引发。It defines a widening conversion that does not involve data loss and does not throw an . 方法使诸如以下的代码：The method makes code such as the following possible: [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Operators#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Operators/cs/Operators.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Operators#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Operators/vb/Operators.vb#7)] 此方法等效于构造函数。This method is equivalent to the constructor. 所生成的偏移量对象上的值取决于属性的`dateTime`参数：The offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the property of the `dateTime` parameter: - 如果的值属性是，日期和时间对象设置为等于`dateTime`，并将其属性设置为等于 0。If the value of the property is , the date and time of the object is set equal to `dateTime`, and its property is set equal to 0. - 如果的值属性是或，日期和时间对象设置为等于`dateTime`，并将其属性设置为等于本地系统的当前时区的偏移量。If the value of the property is or , the date and time of the object is set equal to `dateTime`, and its property is set equal to the offset of the local system's current time zone. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析具有三个元素，可以按任何顺序出现，并通过空白分隔的字符串。 parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 这三个要素是下表中所示。These three elements are as shown in the following table. |元素Element|示例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<时间 >\|"1:02:03 PM""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移 > 不能单独出现。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必须提供任意一个协同\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前天。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值是 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<日期 > 已存在但其组件包含仅有两个数字的年份，它将转换到值的基础的当前区域性的当前日历中每年属性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. \<偏移量 > 可表示为负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。\ can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情况下，\<偏移 > 必须包括正负符号。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol. `input`通过使用中的格式设置信息分析字符串初始化为当前区域性的对象。The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current culture. 若要分析的字符串，其中包含指定格式设置不一定对应于当前区域性的格式设置，请使用方法并提供格式说明符。To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to the formatting of the current culture, use the method and provide a format specifier. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法来分析日期和时间的多个字符串。The following example calls the method to parse several date and time strings. 该示例包括输出从 2007 年 3 月 22 日，其区域性为 en 的系统上-我们。The example includes output from March 22, 2007, on a system whose culture is en-us. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Parse/cs/ParseExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Parse/vb/ParseExamples.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的日期，必须在所定义的格式的字符串表示形式`format`参数。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter. 它还需要\<日期 >，\<时间 >，并\<偏移量 > 元素的日期和时间的字符串表示形式出现在指定的顺序`format`。It also requires that the \, \, and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`input`字符串不匹配这`format`参数，该方法将引发。If the `input` string does not match this `format` parameter, the method throws a . 与此相反，方法分析的字符串表示形式中任何一种可识别的格式提供程序的格式的日期对象。In contrast, the method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's object. 此外允许\<日期 >，\<时间 >，和\<偏移 > 要按任何顺序出现的日期和时间的字符串表示形式中的元素。 also allows the \, \, and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order. `format`参数是一个包含单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义所需的格式的字符串`input`参数。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of the `input` parameter. 有关有效的格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果`format`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，则该方法将引发。If the sign is missing, the method throws a . 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配的时间为午夜 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象被分配本地系统上的当前日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不需要`input`包含偏移量，从而对象分配的本地系统时区偏移量。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the resulting object is assigned the time zone offset of the local system. 特定日期和时间的符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数，因为是精确的格式`input`如果`format`是一个标准格式说明符的字符串。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, as is the precise format of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以是以下之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - 一个表示区域性的对象基于所`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 返回的对象及其属性定义的符号和格式设置`input`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`，则使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用使用标准和自定义格式说明符和固定区域性分析日期和时间的多个字符串的方法。The following example uses the method with standard and custom format specifiers and the invariant culture to parse several date and time strings. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact/cs/ParseExact.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact/vb/ParseExact.vb#1)] 下面的示例分析应符合的字符串数组[ISO 8601](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md#the-round-trip-o-o-format-specifier)。The following example parses an array of strings that are expected to conform to [ISO 8601](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md#the-round-trip-o-o-format-specifier). 输出中的示例所示，为带有前导或尾随空格的字符串无法分析成功，因为执行日期和时间不在范围内的元素的字符串。As the output from the example shows, strings with leading or trailing spaces fail to parse successfully, as do strings with date and time elements that are out of range. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法分析表示的日期的任何一种分配到的模式匹配的字符范围`formats`参数。This method parses a character span representing a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 如果`input`与任何定义的变体不匹配。 这些模式的任一`styles`参数，该方法将引发。If `input` does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a . 除了比较`input`到多个格式设置模式，此重载的行为与完全相同方法。Aside from comparing `input` to multiple formatting patterns, this overload behaves identically to the method. `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素包含一个单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义的可能模式的`input`参数。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of the `input` parameter. 当调用该方法时，`input`必须与其中一种模式相匹配。When the method is called, `input` must match one of these patterns. 有关有效的格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，则该方法将引发。If the sign is missing, the method throws a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用`formats`的此重载来指定多个格式参数可以帮助减少很多用户在输入日期和时间时遇到的错误。Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times. 具体而言，定义多个输入的模式的功能使应用程序能够处理日期和时间的表示形式，可以包括或缺少几个月、 天、 小时、 分钟和秒为单位中的前导零。In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配的时间为午夜 (0: 00:00)。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象被分配本地系统上的当前日期。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不需要`input`包含偏移量，所生成的偏移量对象上的值取决于`styles`参数。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包括，本地时区的偏移量分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包括，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果未指定任一值，则使用本地时区的偏移量。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和时间的符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 同样适用于的确切格式`input`，如果匹配的元素的`formats`是一个标准格式说明符的字符串。The same is true for the precise format of `input`, if the matching element of `formats` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以是以下之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - 一个表示区域性的对象基于所`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 返回的对象属性定义的符号和格式设置`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`，则使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串中指示如何分析而无需显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串，并支持 UTC 转换在分析操作的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is permitted in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成员除支持枚举。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出了每个受支持的成员的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成员`DateTimeStyles` member|行为Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||分析`input`和，如果有必要，将其转换为 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相当于分析字符串，并调用方法所返回的对象。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了本地时区的偏移量。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了 UTC 偏移量 （+ 00:00）。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||允许`input`若要包含未指定的内部空白`format`。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by `format`. 额外的空白区域可以显示日期和时间组件之间以及各个组件 （除偏移量），内部和分析字符串时，将忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components (except the offset), and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的尾随空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导、 尾随和内部空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `formats`. 未在中的匹配元素中指定的所有多余空白字符`formats`分析字符串时，将忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in the matched element in `formats` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||指示该额外的空白区域中不允许使用`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 必须出现空白中的特定元素指定的那样`formats`以便匹配。White space must appear exactly as specified in a particular element of `formats` for a match to occur. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||具有不起作用，因为结构不包括`Kind`属性。Has no effect because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.|

to parse several date and time strings. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact/cs/ParseExact.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact/vb/ParseExact.vb#2)] 下面的示例使用的各种值来分析应符合的字符串数组[ISO 8601](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md#the-round-trip-o-o-format-specifier)。The following example uses a variety of values to parse an array of strings that are expected to conform to [ISO 8601](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md#the-round-trip-o-o-format-specifier). 如示例输出所示，采用正确格式的字符串无法分析如果：As the output from the example shows, strings that are in the proper format fail to parse if: - 它们包含空格和相应标志 (如尚未在方法调用中提供。they contain white space, and an appropriate flag (such as has not been supplied in the method call. - 它们包含日期和时间不在范围内的元素。they contain date and time elements that are out of range. 假定未指定 UTC 偏移量的字符串具有的本地时区偏移量 (在本例中为-07:00) 除非标志在方法调用中提供。Strings that do not specify a UTC offset are assumed to have the offset of the local time zone (in this case, -07:00) unless the flag is supplied in the method call. 在这种情况下，它们被假定为协调世界时。In that case, they are assumed to be Universal Coordinated Time. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的日期的任何一种分配到的模式匹配的字符串表示形式`formats`参数。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 如果`input`字符串不与任何定义的变体匹配这些模式的任一`styles`参数，该方法将引发。If the `input` string does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a . 除了比较`input`到多个格式设置模式，此重载的行为与完全相同方法。Aside from comparing `input` to multiple formatting patterns, this overload behaves identically to the method. `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素包含一个单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义的可能模式的`input`参数。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of the `input` parameter. 当调用该方法时，`input`必须与其中一种模式相匹配。When the method is called, `input` must match one of these patterns. 有关有效的格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，则该方法将引发。If the sign is missing, the method throws a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用`formats`的此重载来指定多个格式参数可以帮助减少很多用户在输入日期和时间时遇到的错误。Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times. 具体而言，定义多个输入的模式的功能使应用程序能够处理日期和时间的表示形式，可以包括或缺少几个月、 天、 小时、 分钟和秒为单位中的前导零。In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. 该示例提供这样的一个示例。The example provides an illustration of this. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配的时间为午夜 (0: 00:00)。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象被分配本地系统上的当前日期。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不需要`input`包含偏移量，所生成的偏移量对象上的值取决于`styles`参数。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包括，本地时区的偏移量分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包括，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果未指定任一值，则使用本地时区的偏移量。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和时间的符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 同样适用于的确切格式`input`，如果匹配的元素的`formats`是一个标准格式说明符的字符串。The same is true for the precise format of `input`, if the matching element of `formats` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以是以下之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - 一个表示区域性的对象基于所`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 返回的对象属性定义的符号和格式设置`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`，则使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串中指示如何分析而无需显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串，并支持 UTC 转换在分析操作的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is permitted in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成员除支持枚举。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出了每个受支持的成员的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成员`DateTimeStyles` member|行为Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||分析`input`和，如果有必要，将其转换为 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相当于分析字符串，并调用方法所返回的对象。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了本地时区的偏移量。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了 UTC 偏移量 （+ 00:00）。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||允许`input`若要包含未指定的内部空白`format`。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by `format`. 额外的空白区域可以显示日期和时间组件之间以及各个组件 （除偏移量），内部和分析字符串时，将忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components (except the offset), and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的尾随空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导、 尾随和内部空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `formats`. 未在中的匹配元素中指定的所有多余空白字符`formats`分析字符串时，将忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in the matched element in `formats` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||指示该额外的空白区域中不允许使用`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 必须出现空白中的特定元素指定的那样`formats`以便匹配。White space must appear exactly as specified in a particular element of `formats` for a match to occur. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||具有不起作用，因为结构不包括`Kind`属性。Has no effect because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下面的示例定义了多个输入的格式的日期和时间和偏移量的值的字符串表示形式，然后将传递到用户输入的字符串方法。The following example defines multiple input formats for the string representation of a date and time and offset value, and then passes the string that is entered by the user to the method. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact/cs/ParseExact.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact/vb/ParseExact.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换同时对象为协调世界时 (UTC)，然后再计算的时间间隔将它们分开。This method converts both objects to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before calculating the time interval that separates them. 这会删除任何可能造成的影响不同相对于 UTC 的偏移量的比较。This removes any effect that different offsets from UTC may have on the comparison. > [!NOTE] > 对于支持自定义的运算符的语言，还可以通过使用减法运算符执行日期和时间相减。For languages that support custom operators, you can also perform date and time subtraction by using the subtraction operator. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法。For details, see the method. 因为任一当前对象也不`value`参数表示的日期和时间以特定时区，方法不考虑特定时区的调整规则的日期和时间相减时。Because neither the current object nor the `value` parameter represent the date and time in a specific time zone, the method does not consider a particular time zone's adjustment rules when it subtracts dates and times. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用减法方法。The following example illustrates subtraction that uses the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值不会影响属性属性。The property is not affected by the value of the property. 值属性表示 0001 年 1 月 1 日凌晨 12:00:00 午夜起经过的 100 纳秒间隔数 (的值)。The value of the property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight on January 1, 0001 (the value of ). 它不包括将闰秒所添加的计时周期数。It does not include ticks that would be added by leap seconds. 一纳秒等于第二个; 的一个第 10 亿用户在一秒内有 10 万个计时周期数。A nanosecond is one billionth of a second; there are ten million ticks in a second. 值属性介于`DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks`到`DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`。The value of the property ranges from `DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks` to `DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`. 可以将分配到的计时周期数对象使用构造函数重载。You can assign the number of ticks to a object by using the constructor overload. ## Examples 下面的示例初始化对象通过在 2008 年 7 月 1 日的日期中估计的计时周期数来 1:23:07。The following example initializes a object by approximating the number of ticks in the date July 1, 2008 1:23:07. 然后，显示的日期和该日期表示到控制台的计时周期数。It then displays the date and the number of ticks represented by that date to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行转换为本地时间，该方法首先将当前对象的日期和时间为协调世界时 (UTC) 通过减去从时间偏移量。In performing the conversion to local time, the method first converts the current object's date and time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by subtracting the offset from the time. 它然后将转换的 UTC 日期和时间为本地时间通过添加本地时区偏移量。It then converts the UTC date and time to local time by adding the local time zone offset. 在执行此操作，需要本地时区的任何调整规则的帐户。In doing this, it takes account of any adjustment rules for the local time zone. 这两个值的当前对象和的值方法调用返回的对象表示相同的点的时间。Both the value of the current object and the value of the object returned by the method call represent the same point in time. 也就是说，如果同时传递给方法，该方法将返回`true`。That is, if both are passed to the method, the method will return `true`. 如果转换会导致不在范围内的时间类型，方法将返回对象，它具有的日期和时间设置为或和偏移量设置为本地时区偏移量。If the conversion causes a time that is out of range of the type, the method returns a object that has the date and time set to either or and the offset set to the local time zone offset. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将为太平洋标准时区中的本地时间的值。The following example uses the method to convert a value to local time in the Pacific Standard Time zone. 它还阐释了对本地时区的调整规则的方法的支持。It also illustrates the method's support for the local time zone's adjustment rules. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的返回值是相同的方法，但它包含空格跟在字符串末尾追加了偏移量。The return value of this method is identical to that of the method, except that it includes a space followed by the offset appended at the end of the string. 换而言之，它还设置使用短日期模式，长时间模式的输出格式和`zzz`自定义格式字符串，且从上一个元素由空格分隔每个元素。In other words, it formats output using the short date pattern, the long time pattern, and the `zzz` custom format string, with each element separated from the previous element by a space. 例如，如果返回的值为 2008 年 1 月 12 日下午 6:15:50，返回的值为 2008 年 1 月 12 日下午 6:15:50-08:00 的时间是八个小时后协调世界时 (UTC)。For example, if returns a value of 1/12/2008 6:15:50 PM, returns a value of 1/12/2008 6:15:50 PM -08:00 for a time that is eight hours behind Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 此方法使用派生自当前区域性的格式设置信息。This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 另一个重载方法使您能够指定的区域性的格式设置的使用，并定义输出模式的值。Other overloads of the method enable you to specify the culture whose formatting to use, and to define the output pattern of the value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用方法，并显示其输出当前区域性为 en 的系统上-我们。The following example illustrates calls to the method and displays its output on a system whose current culture is en-us. remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`参数应包含单个格式说明符 (请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自定义格式模式 (请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))，它定义返回的字符串的格式。The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) that defines the format of the returned string. 如果`format`是 null 或为空字符串 ("")，则值使用默认格式的输出。If `format` is a null or empty string (""), the value is output using the default format. 下表显示了某些格式说明符与一起使用时的确切操作，从与一起使用时其行为方面与它不同。The following table shows the exact operation of certain format specifiers when used with , which differs from their behavior when used with . |现有的格式说明符Existing format specifier|新行为New behavior| |-------------------------------|------------------| |“K”"K"|设计往返日期和时间。Designed to round-trip a date and time. 使用，映射到"zzz"（偏移量始终显示为带有小时和分钟）。With , maps to "zzz" (the offset is always displayed with hours and minutes). 请注意，"K"自定义格式说明符;它不能显示为单个字符`format`。Note that "K" is a custom format specifier; it cannot appear as the single character in `format`.| |“U”"U"|不支持。Not supported.| |"r""r"|将转换对象为协调世界时 (UTC)，并输出使用自定义格式字符串`ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`。Converts the object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs it using the custom format string `ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`.| |“u”"u"|将转换UTC 到对象并将其使用的格式输出`yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`。Converts the object to UTC and outputs it using the format `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`.| 其余的标准日期和时间格式说明符的行为相同，但有方法与使用方法。The remaining standard date and time format specifiers behave the same with the method as they do with the method. 此方法使用派生自当前区域性的格式设置信息。This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的示例显示在控制台中使用的每个标准日期和时间格式说明符的对象。The following example displays a object to the console using each of the standard date and time format specifiers. 使用 en 格式化输出的区域性。The output is formatted by using the en-us culture. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/cs/ToString.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/vb/ToString.vb#3)]

The method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the current culture. If the value of the current instance is earlier than or later than , the method throws an . The following example provides an illustration. It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the class when the current culture is Hebrew (Israel). remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`参数应包含单个格式说明符 (请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自定义格式模式 (请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)).The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)). 如果`format`是 null 或为空字符串 ("")，则对象使用默认格式的输出。If `format` is a null or empty string (""), the object is output using the default format. 下表显示了某些格式说明符与一起使用时的确切操作，从与一起使用时其行为方面与它不同。The following table shows the exact operation of certain format specifiers when used with , which differs from their behavior when used with . |现有的格式说明符Existing format specifier|新行为New behavior| |-------------------------------|------------------| |“K”"K"|设计往返日期和时间。Designed to round-trip a date and time. 使用，映射到"zzz"（偏移量始终显示为带有小时和分钟）。With , maps to "zzz" (the offset is always displayed with hours and minutes). 请注意，"K"自定义格式说明符;它不能显示为单个字符`format`。Note that "K" is a custom format specifier; it cannot appear as the single character in `format`.| |“U”"U"|不支持。Not supported.| |"r""r"|将转换对象为协调世界时 (UTC)，并输出使用自定义格式字符串`ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`。Converts the object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs it using the custom format string `ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`.| |“u”"u"|将转换为 UTC 值并将其使用的格式输出`yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`。Converts the value to UTC and outputs it using the format `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`.| 其余的标准日期和时间格式说明符的行为相同，但有方法与使用方法。The remaining standard date and time format specifiers behave the same with the method as they do with the method. 对应于标准格式说明符，以及符号和日期和时间组件的名称模式的定义由`formatProvider`参数。The pattern that corresponds to standard format specifiers, as well as the symbols and names of date and time components, is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. `formatProvider`参数可以是以下之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - 一个对象，表示的格式设置中使用的区域性`input`。A object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in `input`. 返回的对象属性定义中使用的格式`input`。The object returned by the property defines the formatting used in `input`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatProvider`是`null`，则使用当前区域性关联的对象 (请参阅)。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object associated with the current culture is used (see ). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来显示对象的多个不同的区域性，使用自定义格式字符串。The following example uses the method to display a object using a custom format string for several different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/cs/ToString.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/vb/ToString.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回对象，其属性设置为零。This method returns a object whose property is set to zero. 这两个值的当前对象和的值方法调用返回的对象表示相同的点的时间。Both the value of the current object and the value of the object returned by the method call represent the same point in time. 也就是说，如果同时传递给方法，该方法将返回`true`。That is, if both are passed to the method, the method will return `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法，将本地时间和几个其他时间转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。The following example calls the method to convert a local time and several other times to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). remarks.format: ## Remarks Unix 时间表示自 1970 年 1 已过去的秒数-01-01T00:00:00Z (1，1970 年 1 月在 UTC 时间上午 12:00)。Unix time represents the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1, 1970, at 12:00 AM UTC). 它不会考虑闰秒。It does not take leap seconds into account. 此方法返回毫秒的数的 Unix 时间。This method returns the number of milliseconds in Unix time. 此方法首先将在其 Unix 时间中返回的毫秒数之前的当前实例转换为 UTC。This method first converts the current instance to UTC before returning the number of milliseconds in its Unix time. 对于早于 1970 年的日期和时间值-01-01T00:00:00Z，此方法返回一个负值。For date and time values before 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z, this method returns a negative value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法就像方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。This overload of the method is like the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 分析具有三个元素，可以按任何顺序出现，并通过空白分隔的字符串。It parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 下表中显示这三个元素。These three elements are shown in the following table. |元素Element|示例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<时间 >\|"1:02:03 PM""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移 > 不能单独出现。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必须提供任意一个协同\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前天。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<日期 > 已存在但其组件包含仅有两个数字的年份，它将转换到值的基础的当前区域性的当前日历中每年属性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值是 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. 如果\<偏移量 >，则它可以表示为负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。If \ is present, it can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号，否则该方法返回`false`。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol or the method returns `false`. `input`通过使用中的格式设置信息分析字符串对象初始化为当前区域性。The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a object initialized for the current culture. 若要分析包含指定格式设置不一定对应于当前区域性的字符串，请使用方法并提供格式说明符。To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to that of the current culture, use the method and provide a format specifier. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法，以便分析各种日期和时间格式的多个字符串。The following example calls the method to parse several strings with various date and time formats. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载就像方法，不同之处在于此方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。This overload is like the method, except that this method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它所分析的日期和时间必须与指定的模式完全匹配表示`format`参数。It parses the representation of a date and time that must exactly match the pattern specified by the `format` parameter. 如果`input`不匹配此模式下，使用一些可能的变体中定义的空白`styles`参数，在分析操作失败，并且该方法将返回`false`。If `input` does not match this pattern, with some possible variations in white space defined by the `styles` parameter, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. `format`参数是一个包含单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义所需的模式的字符范围`input`。The `format` parameter is a character span that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required pattern of `input`. 有关有效的格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果`format`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，在分析操作将失败，该方法将返回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配的时间为午夜 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象被分配本地系统上的当前日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不需要`input`包含偏移量，所生成的偏移量对象上的值取决于`styles`参数。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包括，本地时区的偏移量分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包括，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果未指定任一值，则使用本地时区的偏移量。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和时间的符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 这同样适用的精确模式`input`如果`format`是一个标准格式说明符的字符串。The same is true for the precise pattern of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以是以下之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - 一个表示区域性的对象基于所`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 返回的对象属性定义符号和中允许使用标准格式`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and standard formats allowed in `input`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`，则使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串中指示如何分析而无需显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串，并支持 UTC 转换在分析操作的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成员除支持枚举。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出了每个受支持的成员的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成员`DateTimeStyles` member|行为Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||分析`input`和，如果有必要，将其转换为 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相当于分析日期和时间的表示形式，并调用方法所返回的对象。It is equivalent to parsing a date and time representation, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果`format`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了本地时区的偏移量。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||如果`format`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了 UTC 偏移量 （+ 00:00）。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||允许`input`包括内部的空白区域，未指定的格式。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by format. 额外的空白区域可以显示日期和时间组件之间以及各个组件，以外偏移量，内部和分析字符串时，将忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components, other than the offset, and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导空格`format`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `format`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的尾随空格`format`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `format`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导、 尾随和内部空格`format`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `format`. 中未指定的所有多余空白字符`format`分析字符串时，将忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in `format` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||指示该额外的空白区域中不允许使用`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 必须出现空白中指定的那样`format`。White space must appear exactly as specified in `format`. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||没有任何作用，因为结构不包括`Kind`属性。Has no effect, because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法分析的日期的任何一种分配到的模式匹配的字符串表示形式`formats`数组。This method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` array. 如果`input`与定义的任何变体这些模式的任何一个不匹配`styles`参数，在分析操作失败，并且该方法将返回`false`。If `input` does not match any one of these patterns with any variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. 除了比较`input`为包含格式说明符的多个字符串，此重载的行为与完全相同方法。Aside from comparing `input` to multiple strings that contain format specifiers, this overload behaves identically to the method. `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素包含一个单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义的可能模式的`input`。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of `input`. 有关有效的格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，分析操作失败，该方法将返回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用`formats`的此重载来指定多个格式参数可以帮助减少很多用户在输入日期和时间时遇到的错误。Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times. 具体而言，定义多个输入的模式的功能使应用程序能够处理日期和时间的表示形式，可以包括或缺少几个月、 天、 小时、 分钟和秒为单位中的前导零。In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. 该示例提供这样的一个示例。The example provides an illustration of this. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配的时间为午夜 (0: 00:00)。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`需要输入包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象被分配本地系统上的当前日期。If the matched element in `formats` requires that input contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不需要`input`包含偏移量，所生成的偏移量对象上的值取决于`styles`参数。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包括，本地时区的偏移量分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包括，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法就像方法，不同之处在于此方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。This overload of the method is like the method, except that this method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它会分析日期和时间必须与指定的模式完全匹配的字符串表示形式`format`参数。It parses the string representation of a date and time that must exactly match the pattern specified by the `format` parameter. 如果`input`字符串不匹配此模式下，使用一些可能的变体中定义的空白`styles`参数，在分析操作失败，并且该方法将返回`false`。If the `input` string does not match this pattern, with some possible variations in white space defined by the `styles` parameter, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. `format`参数是一个包含单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义所需的模式字符串`input`。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required pattern of `input`. 有关有效的格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果`format`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，在分析操作将失败，该方法将返回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配的时间为午夜 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象被分配本地系统上的当前日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不需要`input`包含偏移量，所生成的偏移量对象上的值取决于`styles`参数。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包括，本地时区的偏移量分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包括，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果未指定任一值，则使用本地时区的偏移量。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和时间的符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 这同样适用的精确模式`input`如果`format`是一个标准格式说明符的字符串。The same is true for the precise pattern of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以是以下之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - 一个表示区域性的对象基于所`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 返回的对象属性定义符号和中允许使用标准格式`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and standard formats allowed in `input`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`，则使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串中指示如何分析而无需显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串，并支持 UTC 转换在分析操作的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成员除支持枚举。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出了每个受支持的成员的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成员`DateTimeStyles` member|行为Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||分析`input`和，如果有必要，将其转换为 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相当于分析字符串，并调用方法所返回的对象。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果`format`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了本地时区的偏移量。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||如果`format`不需要`input`包含偏移量的值，则返回的对象都提供了 UTC 偏移量 （+ 00:00）。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||允许`input`包括内部的空白区域，未指定的格式。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by format. 额外的空白区域可以显示日期和时间组件之间以及各个组件，以外偏移量，内部和分析字符串时，将忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components, other than the offset, and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导空格`format`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `format`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的尾随空格`format`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `format`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导、 尾随和内部空格`format`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `format`. 中未指定的所有多余空白字符`format`分析字符串时，将忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in `format` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||指示该额外的空白区域中不允许使用`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 必须出现空白中指定的那样`format`。White space must appear exactly as specified in `format`. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||没有任何作用，因为结构不包括`Kind`属性。Has no effect, because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法使用标准和自定义格式说明符，固定区域性和各种值来分析日期和时间的多个字符串。The following example uses the method with standard and custom format specifiers, the invariant culture, and various values to parse several date and time strings. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact/cs/TryParseExact.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact/vb/TryParseExact.vb#1)] 下面的示例使用的各种值来分析应符合的字符串数组[ISO 8601](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md#the-round-trip-o-o-format-specifier)。The following example uses a variety of values to parse an array of strings that are expected to conform to [ISO 8601](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md#the-round-trip-o-o-format-specifier). 如示例输出所示，采用正确格式的字符串无法分析如果：As the output from the example shows, strings that are in the proper format fail to parse if: - 它们包含空格和相应标志 (如尚未在方法调用中提供。they contain white space, and an appropriate flag (such as has not been supplied in the method call. - 它们包含日期和时间不在范围内的元素。they contain date and time elements that are out of range. 假定未指定 UTC 偏移量的字符串具有的本地时区偏移量 (在本例中为-07:00，这反映了太平洋夏令时时区的偏移量) 除非标志在方法调用中提供。Strings that do not specify a UTC offset are assumed to have the offset of the local time zone (in this case, -07:00, which reflects the offset of the Pacific Daylight Time zone) unless the flag is supplied in the method call. 在这种情况下，它们被假定为协调世界时。In that case, they are assumed to be Universal Coordinated Time. [!code-csharp[Parsing ISO 8601 strings](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system/datetimeoffset/tryparseexact/tryparseexacto8601-2.cs)] [!code-vb[Parsing ISO 8601 strings](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system/datetimeoffset/tryparseexact/tryparseexacto8601-2.vb)]

operation fails and the method returns `false`. 除了比较`input`为包含格式说明符的多个字符串，此重载的行为与完全相同方法。Aside from comparing `input` to multiple strings that contain format specifiers, this overload behaves identically to the method. `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素包含一个单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义的可能模式的`input`。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of `input`. 有关有效的格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，分析操作失败，该方法将返回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用`formats`的此重载来指定多个格式参数可以帮助减少很多用户在输入日期和时间时遇到的错误。Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times. 具体而言，定义多个输入的模式的功能使应用程序能够处理日期和时间的表示形式，可以包括或缺少几个月、 天、 小时、 分钟和秒为单位中的前导零。In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the returns if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement. In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值表示当前 对象的协调世界时 (UTC) 日期和时间。

span.span: Gets a value that represents the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的协调世界时 (UTC) 日期和时间。

span.span: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性执行双重转换：The property performs a dual conversion: - 它会将转换的日期和时间的当前对象为协调世界时 (UTC)。It converts the date and time of the current object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 通过减去的值来执行转换中的日期和时间的当前属性对象。The conversion is performed by subtracting the value of the property from the date and time of the current object. - 它将转换值设为值。It converts the value to a value. 所返回的属性值设置为。The property of the returned value is set to . 检索的值属性相当于调用当前对象的`ToUniversalTime.DateTime`属性，不同之处在于后者的属性值是。Retrieving the value of the property is equivalent to calling the current object's `ToUniversalTime.DateTime` property, except that the property of the latter value is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何利用属性来显示值和其对应的 UTC 时间。The following example shows how to use of the property to display a value and its corresponding UTC time. summary.span: 获取一个 对象，其日期和时间设置为当前的协调世界时 (UTC) 日期和时间，其偏移量为 。

span.span: Gets a object whose date and time are set to the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time and whose offset is .

value.span: 一个对象，其日期和时间为当前的协调世界时 (UTC)，其偏移量为 。

span.span: An object whose date and time is the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and whose offset is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性计算当前通用协调时间 (UTC) 基于本地系统时钟时间，并由本地系统的时区偏移量。The property computes the current Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) based on the local system's clock time and an offset defined by the local system's time zone. 当前 UTC 时间的毫秒部分的精度取决于系统时钟的分辨率。The precision of the current UTC time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock. 在 Windows NT 3.5 及更高版本、 和 Windows Vista 操作系统上，时钟的分辨率大约为 10-15 毫秒。On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds. ## Examples 下面的示例说明了协调世界时 (UTC) 和本地时间之间的关系。The following example illustrates the relationship between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and local time. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#18)]

summary.span: 获取表示当前 对象的协调世界时 (UTC) 日期和时间的计时周期数。

span.span: Gets the number of ticks that represents the date and time of the current object in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 对象的协调世界时 (UTC) 中的计时周期数。

span.span: The number of ticks in the object's Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性表示 0001 年 1 月 1 日凌晨 12:00:00 午夜起经过的 100 纳秒间隔数 (的值)。The value of the property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight on January 1, 0001 (the value of ). 它不包括将闰秒所添加的计时周期数。It does not include ticks that would be added by leap seconds. 一纳秒等于第二个; 的一个第 10 亿用户在一秒内有 10 万个计时周期数。A nanosecond is one billionth of a second; there are ten million ticks in a second. 值属性介于`DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks`到`DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`。The value of the property ranges from `DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks` to `DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`.

summary.span: 获取由当前 对象所表示的日期的年份组成部分。

span.span: Gets the year component of the date represented by the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的年份组成部分，以 0 到 9999 之间的一个整数值来表示。

span.span: The year component of the current object, expressed as an integer value between 0 and 9999.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值不会影响属性属性。The property is not affected by the value of the property. 此外可以创建的字符串表示形式通过调用对象的年份部分方法与"y"、"yy"或"yyyy"自定义格式说明符。You can also create a string representation of a object's year component by calling the method with the "y", "yy", or "yyyy" custom format specifiers. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的年份组成部分四个不同的方式的值：The following example displays the year component of a value in four different ways: - 通过检索的值属性。By retrieving the value of the property. - 通过调用方法与"y"格式说明符。By calling the method with the "y" format specifier. - 通过调用方法使用"yy"格式说明符。By calling the method with the "yy" format specifier. - 通过调用方法带"yyyy"格式说明符。By calling the method with the "yyyy" format specifier.
